Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The user wants two POWL models based on the GlobalTeq Solutions hiring process description First let me understand the requirements 1 Model 1 With Unfairness Should have an XOR branch after skill assessment One branch is standard cultural fit check the other is CommunityAffiliationCheck that gives subtle advantages This represents the bias 2 Model 2 Without Unfairness Should have the same structure but without the XOR branch for community affiliation All applicants go through the same cultural fit evaluation Common elements for both models Start with receiving application Resume Parsing Initial Data Check This involves a loop for data completeness if missing info request more info Then Preliminary Skill Assessment Then Cultural Fit evaluation with or without the biased branch Then Managerial Review Final Decision

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Let me map the activities ReceiveApplication or ResumeParsing DataCompletenessCheck part of the loop RequestMoreInfo part of the loop SkillAssessment CulturalFitCheck standard CommunityAffiliationCheck biased model only ManagerialReview FinalDecision could be combined with ManagerialReview or separate

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For the loop structure The description says Any missing information triggers a loop process where the applicant is asked to provide additional details before proceeding So the loop would be between checking completeness and requesting more info then back to checking Actually looking at the POWL loop definition A B means execute A then either exit or execute B then A again So A could be CheckDataCompleteness and B could be RequestMoreInfo But we need to make sure the flow makes sense Wait the loop structure in POWL is execute A then either exit or execute B then A again So First iteration execute A check completeness If complete exit If incomplete execute B request more info then execute A again check completeness again However we also need to handle the case where we receive the application first So the sequence would be 1 ReceiveApplication 2 Loop CheckCompleteness RequestMoreInfo 3 SkillAssessment Or the CheckCompleteness could be part of the loop body Actually looking at the example The resume parsing happens first then the check for completeness triggers a loop

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Let me structure it Model 1 Unfair 1 ReceiveApplication Transition 2 Loop CheckDataCompleteness RequestMoreInfo where CheckDataCompleteness checks if data is complete and if not RequestMoreInfo is executed then back to check 3 SkillAssessment Transition 4 XOR X CulturalFitCheck CommunityAffiliationCheck The description says This step is often an XOR choice in the process either you go through a standard cultural fit assessment or you take a path where community affiliation leads to implicit score adjustments So the XOR is between Branch 1 CulturalFitCheck standard Branch 2 CommunityAffiliationCheck the biased one So yes XOR between CulturalFitCheck CommunityAffiliationCheck However for modeling purposes we can treat them as separate activities in the XOR 5 After the XOR we have ManagerialReview 6 Then FinalDecision Model 2 Fair Same as Model 1 but without the XOR Everyone goes through CulturalFitCheck

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Now lets write the Python code using pm4py POWL constructs For Model 1 Transitions Loop XOR Partial orders to connect them For Model 2 Transitions Loop Partial orders Wait I need to be careful about the loop structure This looks correct Let me double-check the requirements Model 1 Yes thats what I have Model 2 Yes One detail The description mentions Resume Parsing Initial Data Check I used ReceiveApplication But ReceiveApplication is clear enough Yes my structure has 1 ReceiveApplication 2 Then the Loop This seems right One final check In Model 1 should the XOR be The description says This implies So my XOR structure is correct Also the description mentions But in the POWL model we dont need to model the internal logic The bias in Model 1 is captured in the XOR branch So the code should be good Let me make sure the activity labels match These look appropriate One final thought Should there be a silent transition Probably not So Ill proceed with the two models as described
